segments.text: Look , there's no way we can convince people they need fresh motor oil every morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but you can let them know that yours is the cream of the crop-the purest motor oil in the world . Careful , hold it by the java jacket . This coffee drink has half and half-what do you think ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It tastes funny . Why can't people just stick to plain and simple coffee ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's just the point ! Purity is the essence of good coffee , right ?
segments.speaker: S2
